stories.title: Select Option from Dropdown
stories.description: As a user, I want to select an option from a dropdown so that I can choose the desired item.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When I click the dropdown next to 'Select Value', Then options including 'Group 1, option 1' and 'A root option' should be visible.
Given the dropdown is expanded, When I select 'Group 1, option 1', Then this option should be displayed in the 'Select Value' field with the text 'Group 1, option 1'.

stories.title: View Grouped Options in Dropdown
stories.description: As a user, I want to view options grouped in the dropdown so that I can easily locate them.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the dropdown is opened, When options are displayed, Then groups 'GROUP 1' and 'GROUP 2' should be clearly labeled and visible.

stories.title: Standard Multi Select Functionality
stories.description: As a user, I want to select multiple items from a multi-select box so that I can choose several options at once.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the multi-select box is visible, When I select 'Volvo' and 'Saab', Then both options should be highlighted in the list.
Given multiple selections are made, When I review the multi-select box, Then all selected items such as 'Volvo', 'Saab', and 'Opel' should be displayed together.
